LanguageData.JRWQuetzalcoatlus.label: Quetzalcoatlus
LanguageData.JRWQuetzalcoatlus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #039920-1975 [QUETZALCOATLUS NORTHROPI] CODENAME: FIRE-BEAK >421
Perhaps the most famous azhdarchid due to its infamy as the largest flying reptile of all time, this magnificent creature lives up to its god-like name with speed, strength and ferocity. When left alone, however, it is truly a sight to behold. Tribals often refer to them as fire beaks, and ward them away with vases full of rainwater.
